awards:
第69届柏林国际电影节(2019)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳短片(提名) 弗洛拉·安娜·布达
　　泰迪熊奖 最佳短片 弗洛拉·安娜·布达

writer.name: 弗洛拉·安娜·布达 Flóra Anna Buda

director.name: 弗洛拉·安娜·布达 Flóra Anna Buda

introduction: 三个女人，三个生活在平行的世界里，直到一只苍蝇在系统中引起一个错误。宇宙崩溃，性在空中，胸罩被高估，星星闪烁！匈牙利艺术家Flóra Anna Buda的动画片《Entropia》中，色彩爆炸，感官上释放出新的可能性：多亏了飞翔，一切都变得抽象，性起到了不可或缺的作用。尽管科幻系列的黑镜也有回响，但它的颜色使一切都更加生动。《河边的母鹿》是对匈牙利动画艺术家R_ka Busci的致敬，他的作品同样在动画电影中开辟了更具创造性的叙事策略。布达的毕业影片预示着匈牙利新一代动画艺术家的到来。Three women, three lives in parallel worlds, until the moment a fly causes a bug in the system. The universe collapses, sex is in the air, bras are overrated and the stars twinkle! In the animated film Entropia by Hungarian artist Flóra Anna Buda, colours explode and sensually unleash new possibilities: Thanks to the fly, all that is abstract comes to life and sexuality plays an integral role. While there are echoes of the sci-fi series Black Mirror, the colours make everything more vibrant. The doe by the river is a nod towards Hungarian animation artist Réka Busci, whose work has equally opened up more creative narrative strategies in animated film. Buda’s graduation film heralds a new generation of animation artists from Hungary.
